data.why:
Module work in IDS, specifically snort rule sets at first.
    Conceptual projects include: IDS::Snort:Rules::Tie - TIEHASH access
    to snort rule files IDS::Snort::Rules - Management of snort rules
    IDS::Snort::Rules::Index - Snort rule indexing IDS::Snort::Config -
    Snort configuration

    Future IDS projects may include log parsing and DB interaction
